name: Ape-X
storyline: The city of Canvendish is on red alert : a giant cybernetic monkey has settled on top of one of its tallest towers. The APE-X laboratory is gathering an army of drones to get its creature back and reestablish order in town, but this monster named Big Mike will show superhuman strength and counter this plan.
summary: APE-X has been built from the ground up to fully take advantage of the StarVR® Virtual Reality HMD. APE-X raises the bar for a LBVRE and is the perfect blend between gaming and immersive storytelling and is Starbreeze flagship for its vision for the future of out-of-home VR.
